author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

The `SET_PORTABLEHOSTMULTICOLLECTION_READ_RULES ` needs the namespace to be explicilt in order to properly build the rule (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49198#issuecomment-3433132389). This PR proposes a minor fix to solve https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49198. In the process, I took the chance to add a test for the vertex SoA writing and reading.

#### PR description:

Tests run.
title: Fix Hit and Track SoA Writing to File
